snippet: President Obama named Susan E. Rice and Samantha Power to major national security posts on Wednesday, promoting two outspoken voices for humanitarian intervention.
abstract: Pres Obama names Susan E Rice and Samantha Power to major national security posts, promoting two outspoken voices for humanitarian intervention; Rice will serve as national security adviser, while Power will replace Rice as ambassador to United Nations; appointments, along with other recent additions to national security team, bring different tone to foreign policy in Obama's second term.
lead_paragraph: President Obama named Susan E. Rice and Samantha Power to major national security posts on Wednesday, promoting two outspoken voices for humanitarian intervention.

headline.seo: Obama Appoints Rice, Power to Key Security Posts
headline.main: Obama’s Choices Reflect Change in Foreign Tone
headline.print_headline: Obama Appoints Rice to Key Post On U.S. Security
